dct_title_s: Planisphaerium terrestre cum utroque coelesti hemisphaerio ... = Vlakke ared-kloot met het beide hemelsch half-rond ...; opera et studio A.F. Zürneri.
dct_description_sm: Surrounded by two celestial maps, 26 astronomical and geographical diagrams, and ill. Includes text explaining the ill. Includes ills. of the Norwegian whirlpool, tides and Mt. Etna. 1 map: hand col., mounted on cloth; 2 hemispheres each 28 cm. in diam., on sheet 51 x 58 cm.
dct_rights_sm: This map is in the public domain.
dct_rightsHolder_sm: Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library. https://www.lib.umich.edu/about-us/policies/copyright-policy
